title: Unblock
body: How can i unblock someone in new client?

replies.body:
You can unblock someone by hitting that Cog Icon in the top-right of the client, then hit the **Block List** tab, then hover over the player you'd like to unblock and hit the X button that shows up.

Let me know if this helped!
Every time I un-block a player, they are re-blocked when I reload LOL.  Tried to start off the new year by un-blocking everyone, and they remain blocked.
